executiveSummary: Entrepreneur Christa Woods pitched her company, Glovesticks, on Shark Tank, seeking $150,000 for 10% equity to grow her odor-eliminating sports gear solution. After discussions on her sales performance, patent status, and business management approach, Lori Greiner and Alex Rodriguez partnered to invest $150,000 for 17% and 12% equity respectively, reaching a final deal.
keyDecisions: Lori Greiner and Alex Rodriguez agreed to jointly invest $150,000 for a combined 29% equity stake in Glovesticks.

actionItems.task: Collaborate with Lori Greiner and Alex Rodriguez to scale Glovesticks’ production, marketing, and sales.
Support Christa Woods in business expansion and operational delegation.

nextSteps: Christa will begin partnership work with Lori and Alex to expand Glovesticks’ market presence, increase production capacity, and enhance distribution channels.
